scripts.deploy:production: pnpm run --filter @secretagent.sh/frontend build && dmno run -- dwrangler deploy --env production
scripts.db:reset:local: pnpm run db:nuke:local && pnpm run db:migrate:local
scripts.db:migrate:local: dmno run -- dwrangler d1 migrations apply secret-agent-dev --local --env local
scripts.db:migrate:prod: SECRETAGENT_ENV=production dmno run -- dwrangler d1 migrations apply secret-agent-prod --remote --env production
scripts.db:migrate:preview: dmno run -- dwrangler d1 migrations apply --env preview secret-agent-preview --remote --env preview
